page.title: 12SNAITH PLAY AREA
page.content: The Snaith play area was opened in 1983 by the Mayor of Snaith, Mr K Dean. It was provided by the Town Council and is jointly owned by the Town and the Primary School. There are two sets of play equipment; a large slide and set of swings for older children and swings, slide,playframe and sandpit for the younger children. The Council are considering building a playmound on the area. They hope to transfer the hill from the school field onto the play area. If they are successful the school will be able to have a proper football pitch for the first time in ten years.
